page.title: 04BRIMINGTON COMMON
page.content: Brimington Common is partly residential being surrounded by agricultural farmland.Deciduous woodland occupies a fraction of the area.A regular bus service conveys people from the Common to nearby Chesterfield, but almost all amenities can be obtained locally.The Common has a Post Office,newsagent and food shop combined with two additional food shops, three public houses and two hairdressers also occupy practical positions.The recreation/sportsground provides amusement for children of all ages, while the Primary School accommodates youngsters from the Brimington area from the age of 5-7yrs.
